mapper.insert: insert into sq_user_question_history(user_name, question_id, question_lib_id, result, submit_time, user_result) value (#{history.username},#{history.questionId},#{history.questionLibId}, #{history.result},#{history.submitTime},#{history.userResult});
mapper.select: select history.id, history.question_lib_id as questionLibId, history.user_name as username, history.result, history.user_result as userResult, history.submit_time as submitTime, history.question_id as questionId from sq_user_question_history as history where history.question_lib_id = #{libId} and history.user_name = #{username}
